definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: This congressman is clever at making scores off hecklers at public meetings.
sentences.chinese: 這位國會議員擅長在公衆集會上駁倒詰難者。

sentences.english: We also elect congressmen from single-member districts.
sentences.chinese: 國會議員也是從每區一票的選舉中選出的。

sentences.english: Dear Mr. Congressman or Senator, what shall I give up first?
sentences.chinese: 親愛的國會議員或參議員，我該首先放棄哪一部分呢？

sentences.english: The Krays were in with a couple of well-known MPs.
sentences.chinese: 克賴一家與幾個著名的國會議員有很好的交情。
這位前國會議員主持了這次調查。

sentences.english: Senators and congressmen play footsie (with each other) while the situation gets steadily worse.
sentences.chinese: 參議員和國會議員私下勾搭，形勢越來越壞。

sentences.english: Parliamentarians in the parliament discussed about problem of abortion.
sentences.chinese: 國會議員在國會商討了墮胎的問題。

sentences.english: Kosachyov, the Russian parliamentarian, grudgingly agrees.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯國會議員，勉強同意。

sentences.english: So now, lawmakers are demanding that they give the money back.
sentences.chinese: 所以現在，國會議員們紛紛要求他們把獎金給退回來。

sentences.english: In this case, the MP from Kapit.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，從加帛國會議員。

sentences.english: The congressman laced into the government for being corrupt.
sentences.chinese: 國會議員譴責政府腐敗。

sentences.english: A congressperson should concern about the constituency's interest.
sentences.chinese: 一個國會議員應該關心選民的利益。

sentences.english: The former state attorney general and congressman seems like a perfectly decent mainline Democrat.
sentences.chinese: 這位前任州檢察長和國會議員是地道的主流民主黨人。

sentences.english: Before we elect him to parliament, We want to know what he stands for.
sentences.chinese: 在我們選他當國會議員之前，我們要知道他的主張。

sentences.english: Twain is fierce enough with crooked congressmen .
sentences.chinese: 馬克吐溫對於不正派的國會議員攻擊甚力。

sentences.english: Because your brother is Congressman Ludlow .
sentences.chinese: 因爲你哥哥是國會議員。

definition: member of the US House of Representatives
